[LEXICON]: No discernible fluency issues; sophisticated vocabulary and complex sentence structures are used effectively without hindering readability.

[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt, unrelated sentences ("The home assistant played ambient music" and "The autonomous vehicle waited at the curb") disrupt thematic continuity.
[LOGIC]: Sudden shifts to modern technological references (e.g., "home assistant," "autonomous vehicle") jar with historical and philosophical context.

[SYNTAX]: Abrupt inclusion of unrelated sentence ("The smart glasses dimmed automatically") disrupting flow.

[LOGIC]: Abrupt shift from spiritual themes to critique of materialism without transitional coherence.
